title: VueJS
description: is a progressive JavaScript framework for building user interfaces.
application: Client side frontend web applications, having Vite as development environment.

title: NuxtJS
description: is a free and open-source framework with an intuitive and extendable way to create type-safe, performant and production-grade full-stack web applications and websites with Vue.js.
application: Static Site Generation, Server Side Rendering & server side scripting.

title: Tailwind CSS
description: is a utility-first CSS framework that can be composed directly in HTML scripts.
application: Dynamic application stylings during development stage. Lightning fast hot-reload with Vite.

title: Pinia
description: is the intuitive store for Vue.js.
application: modular state management with devtools & HMR support.

title: Airtable
description: is a Cloud-Based Hybrid Spreadsheet Database platform.

title: VueUse
description: is a collection of Vue Composition utilities.

title: FormKit
description: is a comprehensive form building framework for Vue developers that makes authoring high quality production-ready forms faster, more accessible, with better DX and UX, and less code. It is easy to learn, and ships with production-ready features like inputs, validation rules, and submission/error handling.
application: Forms type(ing), creation, validation, styling with schemas.

title: HTML 5
description: is a W3C's framework for building user interfaces.
application: semantics, caching, storage, multimedia, web sockets, graphics, and can be used directly with CSS3.

title: JavaScript
description: is a programming language for implementing complex features on web pages.
application: Client-side web development with HTML 5 and CSS3. Coded together with node.js for server side scripting.
